resources.string: You need to configure APRSdroid with your callsign and passcode!
Your passcode does not match your callsign!
APRS Service started. Updates every %d minutes, %d km.
This software may only be used by licensed HAM radio operators!\n\n If you operate without a license, you might be criminally prosecuted!

Enter the passcode for your call
Enter the SSID for your station
Enter the symbol encoded as two characters
Keep GPS on longer to get more precise data
Acquire position from the cellular network
